official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow individuals, to elect, in lieu of the deduction for charitable contributions, a credit against income tax for 50 percent of such contributions.
short_title: Religious and Charitable Donors' Tax Justice Act

summary.text: Religious and Charitable Donors' Tax Justice Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow individuals a nonrefundable income tax credit for charitable contributions in lieu of a deduction. Provides that the credit shall not exceed 50 percent of the deduction which would be allowed or $500, whichever is less.
